title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 297.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 297.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part constitutes the general rules of the Office of

General Services for the installation and operation of telecommunications
facilities in State-owned or operated high-rise buildings under the
jurisdiction of the Office of General Services. Included are buildings in the

Governor Nelson A. Rockefeller Empire State Plaza, downtown Albany and the

Office Building Campus in Albany, as well as the Utica, Syracuse, Watertown, Binghamton, Buffalo, Hornell, Poughkeepsie, Suffolk, and Adam Clayton Powell, Jr. and other New York City State Office Buildings (hereinafter referred to as
the "State Buildings"). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
297.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
